snippet: The bank will pay at least $175 million to settle charges that outside brokers discriminated against black and Hispanic borrowers during the housing boom.
abstract: Wells Fargo agrees to pay at least $175 million to settle accusations that its independent mortgage brokers discriminated against black and Hispanic borrowers during the housing boom; agreement follows Justice Department investigation.
lead_paragraph: The bank will pay at least $175 million to settle charges that outside brokers discriminated against black and Hispanic borrowers during the housing boom.
